website_summaries.verdict: The smaller containers and strong heat/cold retention make this an ideal bento lunchbox for children. Dieters may also appreciate the portion control element, but this is not ideal for larger meal storage.
pros: Retains heat and cold better than most traditional lunch boxes
Works well with portion controlled diet plans
Ventilated soup bowl reduces steaming issues
cons: Lunch jar and containers smaller than expected
Not ideal for larger lunch food portions

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and keep you organized!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bento combo. It definitely keeps your item warm. Zojirushi is a quality brand name. It looks very sturdy and should last a long time. As for portion, it looks small at first. After I finished all the bowls, I am full. This set is for sure for women. If you want to get it for your boyfriend or husband, this might be too small. There are a lot of pieces to wash, if you don’t mind doing dishes by hand. I can also squeeze a drink cup into the lunch bag. Hope everybody enjoy the lunch bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lunch bento
customer_reviews.text: I debated for awhile before purchasing this item, but decided to go for it after receiving a Zojirushi thermos as a gift and being impressed by how well it kept hot drinks hot for hours and ice cubes frozen for hours as well. This is a beautifully designed bento and I get compliments on it every time I used it. The soup and main compartment stays hot, but the top compartment is basically at room temperature. The container sizes look small but are actually good for a very decently sized meal. Great for portion control and storing items separately for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jo L.

customer_reviews.title: Short and sweet
customer_reviews.text: Not bad; living for six years in Japan I got used to the Obento lifestyle; simple, smaller portions, neat. Zojirushi is a large manufacturer and I especially am impressed with the build quality and simplicity of this set. Portion sizes may be a little small for the average American but you can do a lot worse for the price. I only wish there were a side pocket for accessories and that the latch system was was a bit tougher and more precise. You do have some room in the bag for a few snacks etc. Overall I'm very pleased with the Ms. Bento set.
customer_reviews.author: James Frederick Green

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Boooooooo! I bought it at the end of November and At the end of January food gets cold. Really? 2 months of it working great with no complaints. Not worth the money.... Now I have to buy "thermos" brand
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep food hot enough for my tastes.
customer_reviews.text: I did like the multiple containers and the small size - that was all perfect. But I like my food to be very hot when I eat it, and unfortunately it is only lukewarm within 2 hours. I followed all the instructions and preheated the main container with boiling hot water for several minutes, right until I placed my food inside. It is not a bad food holder, but it did not suit my purposes. Their actual insulated thermoses are great (I have one for drinks and it stays very hot for several hours), but this one is not.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Alternative for cold packed lunches
customer_reviews.text: This thermos gives a fantastic option aside from eating cold sandwiches for lunch every day. So far, I done stews, bulgogi, rice, grilled meats, and a few other things. Occasionally for work, I don't always have access to a fridge or a microwave, but having hot food is a nice luxury to have. I can't say for certain how long it keeps things hot since I've usually eaten whatever is in my thermos within 4-5 hours of packing it, but I haven't had any issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Robe

customer_reviews.title: Keep food warm for 5 hours easily
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2nd grader and she loves it! She said when she opens her soup container around noon, it is still steaming hot. She had a cheaper food container before and she said this one is 100 times better. I put boiling hot water in the containers and steel vacuum jar parts to make sure they are all warmed up before putting food around 7:00am. No spills as long as you tighten the lids on correctly. Great lunch container!
customer_reviews.author: Pochi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized lunch bag and this bento holds everything my ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish i found this earlier for my 8 year old's school lunch! Perfect sized lunch bag and this bento holds everything my son wants. He wanted warm rice which middle compartment holds, he wanted soup or porride sometimes that would stay warm, and bottom compartment does that, and he wanted fruits or vegetables, and top compartment holds that. Comes with spork and still plenty of space to hold water bottle and few more snacks. Love it! My husband bought the mr. Bento after eyeing my son's bento and tried to steal it but no, get your own buddy and he did.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholics

customer_reviews.title: Keep food hot for 8 hours more!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the food temperature for more than 8 hours if you follow the instructions, but it's not very convenient to do so every time. To make this container to keep warmth long you will need to put hot water to ”preheat” the inside, then pour the water before you put the small food boxes in. The second layer of the food box is not leakproof, so keep in mind that don't put any liquid thing in it!!
customer_reviews.author: ARES

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Useful.
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression, I wasn't sure it was going to stay as warm as advertised. Surprisingly enough, it did. I've used the lunch jar since purchased. It kept my food warm until lunch time at work. I hate using the shared work microwave and this lunch jar has enabled me to avoid it. The two lower compartments keeps the food warm and the top compartment is luke warm at best to room temperature. I prefer to eat warm rice, so the middle compartment works well for me and the side dish can stay lukewarm to room temperature. Great for on-the-go.
customer_reviews.author: C.Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch jar for kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for kid goes to school. It's easy to carry and keep food warm for long enough. The two-temperature zone is useful to separate the entree and ppetizer or dessert. I don't think this holds enough food for myself so I ordered a larger one with the same design for myself.
customer_reviews.author: yaohui

customer_reviews.title: Unfriendly design, wasting more time to prepare food
customer_reviews.text: Anyone want to buy a stupid lunch box for hand wash only! Go ahead, this is your best choice! You need to take apart of the small pieces. That’s make me go nut! Before you leave home at early morning, you need to heat up your food and put it in this jar. Other wise your food will be bad if you put cold and hot soup in the same jar. And you can not put mixed rice with vegetables and meat together. This will make your food bad ! I don’t know what is this thing design for 100 years ago, people without microwave?
customer_reviews.author: Simon Chan

customer_reviews.title: It is really small
customer_reviews.text: The three bows are so so so small. My 10 year old said Japanese eat too little.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago and it is really not practical or usable. It does not keep food cold or hot, even heating the containers before adding hot food. Putting it together is a bit complicated, which would be fine if it worked. It looks nice and the concept is good but it is very expensive for a mediocre product.
customer_reviews.author: KarenMarie

customer_reviews.title: One word - Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Had previously ordered the MIRA lunch food jar and it worked quiet well for almost a year but then stopped keeping things warm so I decided to try this one even though it was much more expensive. This is a horrible item, leaks and doesn't keep food warm or cold. I followed the directions, put hot water in the container to keep food warm and cold water and in the fridge to keep it cool. Did not work at all but the worst part was the leaking. First time we used it, my son came home and said he didn't eat lunch because the salad dressing had leaked on everything. So glad Amazon let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Live2travel

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.text: Because of Covid-19 my office no longer has a microwave or refrigerator. This thing has saved my life. I heat it around 6 am and eat lunch around noon. Food will still be hot. Love it. Its so easy to clean after. The best purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: ks bradley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food warm long enough for lunch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kindergarten son. I would pack lunch around 7:30am and keeps it warm till his lunch time. Sometimes the leftover is still lukewarm at 3pm. It is important to warm up the bowls with hot water before putting food in. I use the soup bowl for side dish. It's big enough for a kindergartener but I feel like it won't be enough when he grows older. Too bad that the top bowl is not insulated, though it is good to pack fruits and raw veggies. Overall it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hana36

customer_reviews.title: Works great especially for Asian meal
customer_reviews.text: The small compartment on the bottom is for rice and the middle one for other dishes. I used the top one for fruit and it kept the hot hot and the cold cool. Just make sure when you assemble the unit, all the compartment went in the correct order. The smallest one on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Food Warm
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year old son who hates school lunches and wanted to eat warm soup and fried rice instead at school. The size (volume) is perfect for him and he is happy to enjoy warm home cooked lunch at school. The only thing is that I wish it had an attached handle on the actual jar, so I can just put it in my son’s backpack as he often forgets to bring it (carry the tote bag) back home.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin M Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this! Keeps food warm for 6+ hours! No exaggeration!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this food container thing. Saves me sooooo much time and money. I’m a college student and there is like 1 microwave in the student lounge so there’s usually a super long line. Bringing my food with me from home already warmed up, and when lunch break comes around my food is still nice and warm depending on how hot I heated my food before leaving home. And if I don’t get to eat during lunch it is still warm on my ride home around 3pm. Super convenient although a bit bulky, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep my food warm for few hours
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my food warm for few hours but the top bowl doesn’t keep the food warm. So you can put maybe fruit or salad thAt you can actually eat it room temperature but the second n third containers do keep my food warm
customer_reviews.author: Melti You

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I have two kids who use this and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I have two kids who use this and they said the food stays hot all the way until lunch time. That's roughly 4-5 hrs in the containers before they are opened. Excellent product for keeping kids lunch warm to hot!!
customer_reviews.author: Ranell Santa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome container!
customer_reviews.text: I love this food container! We saw this at a store but it cost way more than it did on amazon. It keeps my daughters lunch warm and all in an easy to store and carry case. The sizes for each container are very good portions.
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Works well if you follow instructions. That being said, it's too much of a hassle for me, personally, to use on a daily basis. And I did feel that these containers were less leak-proof than standard tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: bzbee

customer_reviews.title: Small Small Containers
customer_reviews.text: Food stays warm thats HREAT but the containers are Very Very small. Used by my 15 yr old. Not enough food to get full. probably good for grade school kids. Wish they had bigger containers (adult size)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the concept of this lunch box but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of this lunch box but it does not keep soup hot as they claim. Very disappointed. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food warm for hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who likes to eat her own prepared meals at work. This is great because she doesn’t need to wait for the microwave. Food is still warm after 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Choosey One

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby and children also people eat less than normal.
customer_reviews.text: I did a test on it today, put food in it at 12:00, and open at 18:00. After 6 hours, the food is not cold and keeps warm. I love it it worth the price. The most important thing is I start to believe this brand. Zojirushi. By the way, I am a girl and slim, so I think this product only suitable for girls and infants.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you want to save time
customer_reviews.text: Lunch is still nice and warm after six hours. I preheat the shell as instructed and warm my food up before I put them in the shell. If I miss any one of the steps, then my food won’t be as warm but not cold. Soup stays hot after six hours and it’s pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: I would "love it" probably if I made lunches more often.
customer_reviews.text: I would "love it" probably if I made lunches more often. Set is very well made and the features are very well thought out. Your coworkers will laugh at you at first, but then be silenced as they are in awe when you slowly and dramatically separate the individual containers. I packed each container to the brim and it's honestly way too much food. I'm kind of surprised how this simple setup inspires me to pack more even portioned healthy meals. Although it's a "Ms Bento", I am a guy and it is okay to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I like Zojirushi products. The quality is great. When I was looking for lunch boxes for my kids I found this one and ordered one to give a try. It worked good and I ordered one more. It is easy to clean and keeps your food warm and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Anndl

customer_reviews.title: Great for my high schooler
customer_reviews.text: We were getting stuck in the sandwich rut and wanted an alternative. We keep hot items in the small, bottom container and something requiring no temperature control in the middle and cold items on top. The thermos also fits in regular lunch bags (made my daughter happy as the plain gray wasn't doing much for her.) We pack her lunch at 6:30am and follow instructions to put hot water in the thermos and container to prime the containers. She eats lunch around 11:45 and all items are still hot/cold. We love this thing. I do wish the pieces would be identified as top, bottom, middle to make assembly a bit easier, but it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal lunch set
customer_reviews.text: If used properly, this is a great set and it holds a surprising amount of food. I've had it for a while and I use it for work and have been able to pack some cute and tasty bento lunches in it. I only use it for hot food, and you can't mix hot and cold (which is pretty much common sense) and I haven't had any seal issues, cleaning issues, smell or staining after almost 3 years. The bag is cute but it doesn't fit a large enough water bottle for me, so I only use it if I'm carrying some other food with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shantea

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My son's school won't microwave the kids food. He gets tired of sanwiches everyday. With this, I can give him Mac and cheese or chicken nuggets and he has a warm meal for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: C.Yama

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I found a lunch jar that actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased nearly 5 food jars at Amazon, trying to find a perfect fit for my son in daycare. The other 4 was either not keeping the food warm, or hard to open due to the poor design. This one actually works and easy to open as stated by the daycare teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Wang

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: When I do take time to make my lunch, this is what I like to carry it in! The containers are just the right size for rational portions. One container is perfectly-made for either hot or cold food, and keeps temperature well, even in Florida's crazy climate (where, during winter, it could be 32 one day and 85 the next!). The kit comes complete with a "spork" (combination spoon and fork) and carrying case. It is lightweight, so even people with arthritis can tote it without discomfort. If you're a brown-bagger, and especially if you are trying to diet, this is the perfect lunch container!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids in school!
customer_reviews.text: My child is 4 and loves this for Kindergarten! It is a little more space than is needed but she will grow into it and we will use it for several years. It washes out very easily and ours have not leaked! We love it and would definitely buy it again! The thing to know is that this is wider than a standard size metal lunch box so the lid would not close or most other lunch boxes. If you want to have this container AND a thermos you will need a little bit larger of a lunch bag but not much. I purchased one at Sanrio the hello kitty store and everything fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: good product, not as big as you think it is.
customer_reviews.text: this is a really neat set. It keeps your food very warm very cold depending on what you're doing. The only trouble I think I've found with this is that it's tiny. As an adult I think it is small as far as portions are concerned.each container is roughly the size of a KFC side dish. Had I known this I probably wouldn't have ordered this product, but I'm glad I did. I have found different uses for it and it stands up to punishment, dishwasher and transit.
customer_reviews.author: MOJO

customer_reviews.title: It is too small for the adult, it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is too small for the adult, it is only for the bird or baby.. I want to return it., or replace bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew  Washington

customer_reviews.title: Not spill proof
customer_reviews.text: I love using these to make lunch for my 6yo and 11yo daughters. They can take soups and leftovers, but beware, they aren't spill proof and have to be kept upright with liquids. I will say though, that my girls are little. They have big appetites, but they're petite little things and sometimes they complain that they don't hold enough. I think about the reviewers who say their manly husbands are satisfied with these bags every time my 40 lb or 70 lb girls complain I didn't pack them enough food.
customer_reviews.author: Lily C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would allow me to have hot and ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would allow me to have hot and cold items at once. It does not. But it will keep my son's lunch hot until lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and is Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this item is too expensive. I would have expected better quality for what I paid. My biggest problem with the Bento is that it leaks. If there is any liquid at all in the containers, it leaks through and soaks into the bag. I wouldn't dare pack any soup in this thing. Also, it is advertised that the spork magnetically attaches to the container, which it does not. This product is just not what it's cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Susan Cary

customer_reviews.title: Great for small portions
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this primarily so that I can try and control my portion sizes. It works pretty well. Also, because there are multiple containers, it helps to encourage eating a variety of foods rather than just cramming a truckload of spaghetti leftovers into a plastic bin for re-heating at work. The insulated container is good for warm foods, but only if you don't put anything cold in the center bin. Room-temp foods like rice and noodles are best for this section, but the top is where I like to keep my fruit and a bit of yogurt or dessert in the removable half-circle section. Overall, I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: April J. Zarychta

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of the lunchbox . My son always lost lunchbox, I have to buy again and again. But I only buy this brand. It is very good.
customer_reviews.author: yolandapankj

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I had unreasonable expectations. I expected my food to still be hot after 5 hours, but I guess that's asking for too much. Container is not very big, but I'm not a big eater at lunch. I usually only use the 2 top compartments - maybe a better way to retain the heat is to fill the bottom compartment with hot water? The spork is not very practical, but the carrier bag is big enough to hold my own fork and spoon and more, so no issues there.
customer_reviews.author: Starrynight000

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But Not Great for Non-Bento Lunches
customer_reviews.text: This smaller version comes with a much nicer bag than the larger version, which I also have. This bag allows room for drinks/stuff you don't want in the bento box. Since I don't usually use it for bento-style lunches that are packed hot (that was a pipe dream), I have to heat the containers, and they don't microwave well -- they pick up flavors/colors/scents from previous meals. That means I have to bring a separate bowl if I want to use these, so generally I prefer glass. However, even though this looks small it holds a ton, more than enough for a lunch for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm glutton but I can't fit all the food I want to eat in here
customer_reviews.text: First of all the soup container is totally whack. It gives like six spoonfuls worth of soup. If you want to make a meal of your soup, then get another container. I know people who use this size container just for their ketchup. Granted they really like ketchup. Think of your typical GMO conventionally large apple. If you cut two of them up, you'd almost run out of room with all three of these containers. The bag that is comes in is nice because it allows to pack other containers in it with the food I want.
customer_reviews.author: Chambana

customer_reviews.title: The heat preservation effect is average, the price is too expensive, it is not recommended to buy
customer_reviews.text: The heat preservation effect is average, the price is too expensive, it is not recommended to buy
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Hubby approves! !
customer_reviews.text: I pack my husbands lunch around 6am and he has his lunch break around 11-12ish. He says the food is warm enough to enjoy it. He really likes that it is compact, comes with a carrying bag, and that a stainless steel spork is included. If not being able to microwave your food is the problem for you then this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: QueenBelle

customer_reviews.title: Never forget to put hot water into the thermo before put food
customer_reviews.text: I follow instructions and works as it says in the manual I’m very please with this product
customer_reviews.author: edj2

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's lunch at daycare. This thing is genius! It works well, holds plenty of food and packs away nicely. It was made with quality in my opinion. I had to show the teachers how it worked and all the compartments because they can be overlooked. Everyone was amazed by this product after showing them and within a few weeks I noticed that others where using these at my son's daycare too! If you ever have to pack a lunch for someone, these expand your possibilities for a packed lunch. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Wow hot lunch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box. My daughter eats better at school no leftovers. It kept her food warm by lunchtime. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Chua

customer_reviews.title: Keep food warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it works well thus far for 2 months. Daily use. It is for small portion though so don’t expect this to be American size. Most important is that it keeps the food warm for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: MSY

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food Hot
customer_reviews.text: I pack my lunch and usually eat after 5-6 hours and it does its job very well, the soup is kept hot over the hours and its secure. bag is also a plus. one downside is that one container's inner rubber keeps falling off. no big deal but bit annoying since it falls out every time I wash it just put it back and repeat
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids' sack lunch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for both of my kids. It's perfect size for my kids. They only have 15 minutes for lunch at school so whatever I pack in here is more than enough for them, K and 3rd graders. Fried rice or soup stays warm enough at their lunch time, ~4-5 hours after I pack them in the morning. But top tray for veggies and stuff will be a little warm as well so if you need to pack cool stuff, such as cheese or gummies, you will have to pack them separately. Overall very happy about it. Wish I have more choices of designs for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: It is not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We always used this brand and trusted it. This one did not work well. It is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hong

customer_reviews.title: The portion size is perfect. It is not as hughe as it may ...
customer_reviews.text: In the meantime I purchased 3 of these one for each child!!!! The portion size is perfect. It is not as hughe as it may appear in the picture, I think it is the perfect size for a 4th grader. It holds the temperature extremely well and the compartment for room temperature items in the top is amazing. Please send me another one for free for writing this review. I love the stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Maerschel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, appeared exactly like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, appeared exactly like the picture shows. Tested on the bowls and they are all able to prevent leaking. It also has a holder inside the bag for the folk. The size is a little small, but enough for me since I don't eat much. Do not recommend to people who need pack a lot food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: keeps food warm
customer_reviews.text: I use this item for the first time and surprisingly my lunch was kept warm for up to 9 hours...very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Antonette Wauchope

customer_reviews.title: I have to leave it cool down for few mins before I put the food ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep food fresh and really warm even after 5-6 hours. Occasionally food stays even hot at school lunch time if I seal it right out of wok. I have to leave it cool down for few mins before I put the food in the containers so my kid can just have perfect warm meal at lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Lunapony

customer_reviews.title: One of the best lunchboxes I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lunchboxes I've ever bought. I love how it has a container for soup, rice, and other things. It makes it easier to pack my lunch with what I have on hand. This helps me eat healthy. Good portion for women and children. I love it so much I bought another set. :)
customer_reviews.author: peeweemama

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunch
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Vecro on the insulator where's the out quickly
customer_reviews.author: David William Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: I may still try buying another one of these to see if the next one is any better.
customer_reviews.text: The food does NOT keep warm as advertised. Piping hot food packed around 8 AM goes cold by noon. A call to customer service did not help. I may still try buying another one of these to see if the next one is any better.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch pack and take my lunch in it a lot, only gave it a four star because it does not keep hot foods very hot! I pack it in the morning and by 12 or 1:00 hot soup has turned lukewarm. I like the features or it and the size, the portions are just right for me. But, disappointed about not keeping my soup hot!! But, it is attractive, compact and I like how everything fits neatly into one handy and attractive bag. Basically, I have been pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Zojirushi bento box
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these and I love them. They are great for lunches and portion control. Zojirushi is always on point. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: this thing is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Bento box makes great lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and she loves it. Its multiple compartments allow her to carry both hot and cold food to work in a single lunch box, while keeping both close to their original temperature. To be fair, the hot stays relatively warm, and the cold stays relatively cool. If multiple temperature foods are being packed, the cold one must go only in the top container, and hot in the rest--otherwise it won't work as planned. Comes with a handy real metal spork. Seals don't seem to leak, but slight microwave damage is noticed when the bowls are reheated at work. Overall, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Omni

customer_reviews.title: Yes, good
customer_reviews.text: Material isn’t the best, doesn’t feel cheap either. Really keeps food hot. Great it you love to meal prep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a YES for me!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean! Perfect way to carry my lunch! Love the bag and "spork" it comes with!
customer_reviews.author: Phylli Celeste

customer_reviews.title: No more office microwave
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the perfect size for my lunch. I couldn't imagine eating more than what fits in the msBento. I microwaved my food and when it was really hot at 730 I placed it the ms bento and opened it at 1215pm. It was warm and i was happy. I put beans in the soup bowl, rice in the middle and turkey meatballs on top. No longer do I need to use the office microwave. This item lets me continue my lazy streak and not have to get up from my seat. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MidLife Introvert

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! My kids'lunch still warm after 5hour. Easy to open each box, they can do by them self, The carry bag easy machine washable
customer_reviews.author: Icestar

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a middle school student
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for middle school student or adult who is watching portion control. It would be too small for a high school boy or a man I imagine. Food stays warm, not hot, but edible at the lunch hour. Bowls must be washed and dried daily. When not in use we leave lid off the containers or they can develop an odor. My only wish is that there had been a way to include a cold pack to keep cold foods a bit colder and more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to bring lunch to school and meal is still warm during lunch. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the Mr. Bento, but they were out, so I got the Ms. for my husband instead. The portions may be a bit small for him, but there's room in the bag for a piece of fruit or two, so I'm hoping he'll get used to the smaller lunch. He actually takes it to work now, and eats it, so that's a huge improvement! I love being able to use our left overs and get creative. A bit of soup or chili in the bottom, pasta, salad or rice in the middle, and veggies with hummus/peanut butter or hard boiled/pickled eggs and sauerkraut or trail mix in the top. My husband is satisfied by the size of the portions.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3 boyz

customer_reviews.title: Not for a grown adult.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but IT'S TINY! Good for a small child or someone on a very strict diet. It's way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot.
customer_reviews.text: When I followed the directions for keeping food hot we had hot food with steam after 5 hours in the two containers close to the bottom. The top one stays only luke warm. We will be purchasing another one soon. Also easy to remove odors if you follow the cleaning directions.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ward

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep food hot
customer_reviews.text: This product was falsely advertised. The product did not keep the food hot at all. In the morning the foods were heated and placed into the containers, and six hours later the food was barely warm. Also the package was received missing pieces. We were highly disappointed in this product and highly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kinzi

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I would have hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as I would have hoped for. Does not keep food as warm as I would have hoped. Plastic container will "peel" if you heat certain foods too hot (thick sauces, tomato based etc.) I ended up only using the main compartment , and fill the bottom and top compartment with boiling hot water to keep my lunch hot by noon.
customer_reviews.author: Thuan N.

customer_reviews.title: Bento style only do not use fluids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for a bento style option but the fact that it leaks with fluids isn’t really a good option for the price. The dark grey portion of the plastic is a little cheap and cracks easy. It keeps things slightly warm but not as warm as other products I have bought. I wish I had returned it before we used it and cracked it but it’s too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Coronel

customer_reviews.title: Save money and enjoy fresh cook food
customer_reviews.text: Save money and enjoy fresh cook food. Make sure to close it tight. It comes with a bag. Use the bag and clip it tight in the car while driving. If it stumbles and if the caps are not tight...hmmm,
customer_reviews.author: G. Antonio

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This lunch organizer is very nice. The quality is very good and have used it a couple of times already. I like how it allows separation of hot and cold items, along with room in the bag for a drink. Will probably use it cold and microwave at lunchtime instead of heating in the morning because even thought the canister is insulated, it doesn't keep it quite hot enough for me. This way everything will be cold and remain cold (better) together, rather than the cold stuff absorbing the heat from the hot stuff. Convenient Nicely made. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ur mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its just enough food for one. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Kim

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It holds more food than I expected, and there is plenty of space inside the bag to put additional snacks. Make sure the lids are on securely to prevent leaks. The bag it comes with is heavy duty and convenient, and the metal spork is cute and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to take her lunch to school in this stays warm the mac and cheese
customer_reviews.author: MAURICIO RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my friends' kid and it is perfect to use
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my friends' kid and it is perfect to use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cost worthy product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase few months before & it seems very useful for short trips (for my kid food)
customer_reviews.author: Hariharan Murthy

customer_reviews.title: great for lunch/dinner!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They're perfect for me. I use the soup bowl only for white rice. The main dish for food (e.g meat, veggies) and the top bowl for fruits. I wouldn't recommend putting liquid in these things. My bf has the Mr. Bento, his tipped over and made a huge mess. For reference, I'm 4'11 and this fills me up nicely. Very happy! The bag is big enough to fit a bottle of water too!
customer_reviews.author: iheartJA

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy & No Leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: . It does a great job keeping food warm for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica MiNi

customer_reviews.title: It'd be nice if it included a pair of chopsticks
customer_reviews.text: It'd be nice if it included a pair of chopsticks, too. And, even better, if the containers were numbered or color coded for quick identification of which cap goes w/ which bowl. You guys got that, Yojirushi? There're A LOT of parts to wash! Anyway, it's a good product for transporting your food, but can be tweaked to be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality! Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I’ve been using it for about two years and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Patton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily lunches!
customer_reviews.text: The Ms Bento is perfect for taking lunch to work every day! The containers look small but in reality they hold a ton of food. And the tote bag is handy for taking things like drinks or food items that may not work with the Ma Bento (like fruit or packaged yogurt. I will say that the cover for largest container seems to have gotten a little loose but it's not meant for liquids so leaking isn't a problem there.
customer_reviews.author: Drea Crymes

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He says it keeps things pretty warm by the time he has lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Kim

customer_reviews.title: It holds heat pretty decent but I don't like how's all plastic inside ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds heat pretty decent but I don't like how's all plastic inside the containers where it contains the food. Why? when you wash it, compared to the glass containers I used, it gets pretty oily after being washed. You really have to scrub it in order to remove all the oil stains.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Kept my lunch warm
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this the once, but it did the job. I heated up my lunch in the microwave before breakfast, and everything was still warm at noon. Not hot, but comfortably warm. Great for those times when you won't have a microwave handy at lunchtime.
customer_reviews.author: lori from va

customer_reviews.title: ... got this on December 21 2017 and I just love it. I work at amazon fulfillment center and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this on December 21 2017 and I just love it. I work at amazon fulfillment center and at lunch time there are hundreds of people using the microwaves, so For weeks I had a sandwich for lunch until I got this, I use it every day and it keeps my food warm/hot after 5 hours( I haven’t tried it for longer).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It is good for small kids who don't eat too much
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent . The volume is too small to keep enough foot for over ten years boys.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoping Liu

customer_reviews.title: Holds alot of food
customer_reviews.text: Relatively compact for how much food it holds. Held enough for a filling lunch and afternoon snack. Kept food hot for 2 hours after heating.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle List

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos but bag a little snall
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase my daughter a hot thermos to use during lunch. She is only 4 but she loved it and so did her teachers. I do wish the bag was slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Faye R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: i am good to go
customer_reviews.text: is as ordered, but with it can keep both cold and hot, can't have everything. I pack my food at 6am and its still warm at 1pm. NOT HOT, but acceptable.. the o ring comes of in the soup bowl when i open it but if you check it before you tighten it in the morning, i am good to go. also Ms. bento is pretty small. not good for me but my wife is happy with the portion size. I just went and bought the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: HnSu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and still work for me. Nice lunch box I would recommend for anybody to buy
customer_reviews.author: Jasson Kalugendo

customer_reviews.title: We loved it so much I end up buying Ms
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Ms. Bento. It keeps food warm for a long time. We originally bought Mr. Bento for college son so he could eat warm lunch in cold weather. We loved it so much I end up buying Ms. Bento for A daughter and another Mr. Bento for younger son. Soup container doesn’t have any leakage so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Terada

product_meta.title: Zojirushi Stainless Ms. Bento Steel Vacuum Lunch Jar, 28.5-Ounce
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless| Package Quantity:1

ZOJIRUSHI MS. BENTO STAINLESS VACUUM INSULATED LUNCH JAR
LUNCH ON THE GO
Whether in the office or on the go, you can take a healthier, tastier, more interesting lunch with you thanks to Zojirushi's Ms. Bento Stainless Lunch Jar. One of the most versatile lunch boxes you'll ever come across, the Ms. Bento lunch jar comes with three different containers that allow you to pack a multi-course lunch of both hot and cold items easily and securely. 

The jar itself is made of stainless steel and is vacuum-insulated that houses three plastic containers with lids. The large soup bowl comes with gasket-sealed lid to prevent messy spills and is specially insulated to keep soup hot. All pieces should be washed by hand with non-abrasive cleaning pads. Inner bowls are microwave-safe. 

The lunch jar lid also locks to hold all the inner containers. The Ms. Bento also comes with a convenient carry bag with a strap for easy transport. A forked spoon is included with its own protective cover.

Capacity: Main Bowl 10oz, Side Bowl 11 oz, Soup Bowl 7 oz.

Dimensions: Container measures 10 by 6 by 6 inches.

MS. BENTO FEATURES
 * Vacuum insulation keeps foods hot or cold for hours
 * Durable stainless steel construction with excellent heat retention
 * 3 microwaveable inner bowls
 * Washable nonstick coated outer container
 * Includes forked spoon with cover and easy to carry tote bag
 * BPA Free
 * 5 Year Warranty on Vacuum Insulationy

GREAT FOR HOT OR COLD LUNCHES
The Ms. Bento is an excellent way to safely and conveniently pack lunch where microwave or refrigerator may not be available. The Ms. Bento allows you to compartmentalize your food and bring an entire meal, like a pasta dish, soup, salad and cookies in each separate bowl. You will appreciate the “greenness” of packing a lunch in our lunch jars, instead of using a paper bag or disposable containers.

HOW DOES IT KEEP FOOD HOT OR COLD?
With Zojirushi's renowned vacuum insulation technology, air between the two thin layers of stainless steel on the outer container is removed, creating a vacuum. Because there is no air, the temperature on the outside does not transfer into the container; keeping foods hot or cold for hours.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
SIDE BOWL
The Ms. Bento comes with an 11-ounce side bowl that sits inside the lid. It is ideal for foods that should be kept room temperature, such as chips, nuts or snacks. The side bowl is not insulated.

MAIN BOWL
The 10-ounce main bowl is designed to hold the main course. The outer container's vacuum insulation and the insulated lid of the main bowl help keep foods hot or cold for hours without reheating or refrigeration.

SOUP BOWL
The 7-ounce soup bowl has a unique lid that minimizes leaks and is ideal for holding soups, dips, or fruit cocktail. It sits at the bottom of the outer container, where vacuum insulation keeps the foods hot or cold for hours.

FORKED SPOON
Never worry about forgetting your utensils. The Ms. Bento also includes a forked spoon with its own protective cover.
feature_bullets: Round jar with 3 food bowls for hot or cold lunch storage. Vacuum-insulated stainless-steel construction keeps food warm. Includes convenient carrying bag for transport
Microwaveable bowls measure 10.5, 11.2, and 6.8 ounces. Easy-to-clean container washes quickly; forked spoon with protective cover attaches to jar

Heat retention after 6 hours is 149 degree Fahrenheit and cold retention after 6 hours is 50 degree Fahrenheit. Rating is based on water at a starting temperature of 95 degree Celsius at a room temperature of 20 degree Celsius
Note-if the side bowl lid is closed with hot foods inside, the lid may be difficult to remove. In this case open the lid while holding the side bowl gasket with your fingers to allow air inside
Rating is based on water at a starting temperature of 4 degree Celsius at room temperature of 20 degree Celsius; Made of BPA-free plastic
Might contain chemicals which cause Reproductive/ Cancer harm as per P65 warning.
